title: BC to Cut 15,000 Jobs But Spending and Debt to Rise Anyway
description: British Columbia, Canada’s third-most populous province, will chop 15,000 public sector jobs, increase income taxes and delay investments, but its left-leaning government avoided making deep cuts to sprawling spending plans and expects debt to continue rising.
content: British Columbia, Canada’s third-most populous province, will chop 15,000 public sector jobs, increase income taxes and delay investments, but its left-leaning government avoided making deep cuts to sprawling spending plans and expects debt to continue rising.
